info.title: Safety.CustomerApi
info.description: A safety management system. Operations require the "safety:read" or "safety:write" scope.

get.summary: Gets a single incident case by ID.
get.description:
Gets a single incident case by ID.

For help with authorization, please visit https://developer.hcssapps.com/getting-started/request-tokens

application/json.AccidentInjuryExplanation: Employee injured left arm while working on XYZ
application/json.StepsToPreventFutureOccurrences: Hazard control steps will be attached to equipment

400.description:
Bad Request. This typically means one or more request validation errors occurred.
Check the response body for details.
For more help troubleshooting, please see https://dev-developer.hcssapps.com/getting-started/troubleshoot-bad-request

put.summary: Updates an existing incident case by ID
put.description:
Updates an existing incident by ID. If the incident does not already exist,
this call will return an error. 

For help with authorization, please visit https://developer.hcssapps.com/getting-started/request-tokens

parameters.name: incident
parameters.description: The incident you want to modify

application/json.AccidentInjuryExplanation: Employee injured left arm while working on XYZ
application/json.StepsToPreventFutureOccurrences: Hazard control steps will be attached to equipment

400.description:
Bad Request. This typically means one or more request validation errors occurred.
Check the response body for details.
For more help troubleshooting, please see https://dev-developer.hcssapps.com/getting-started/troubleshoot-bad-request

get.summary: Gets a list of incident cases.
get.description:
Gets a list of incident cases.

A response header called "Pagination-MorePagesAvailable" will be sent in the response with a value of "yes" or "no", indicating whether more pages are available after
this one.  That is, if the header value is "yes", the client should request the next page.

For help with authorization, please visit https://developer.hcssapps.com/getting-started/request-tokens

parameters.name: modifiedAfterUtc
parameters.description: Limits the results to incidents that have been updated or created after the specified UTC time.

parameters.name: createdAfterUtc
parameters.description: Limits the results to incidents that have been created after the specified UTC time.

parameters.name: incidentDateAfterUtc
parameters.description: Limits the results to incidents that have an incident date after the specified UTC time.

parameters.name: incidentDateBeforeUtc
parameters.description: Limits the results to incidents that have an incident date before the specified UTC time.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results returned.  Default 1000.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The page offset.  The response header "Pagination-MorePagesAvailable" indicates whether the call should be made again with an incremented offset.

application/json.AccidentInjuryExplanation: Employee injured left arm while working on XYZ
application/json.StepsToPreventFutureOccurrences: Hazard control steps will be attached to equipment

400.description:
Bad Request. This typically means one or more request validation errors occurred.
Check the response body for details.
For more help troubleshooting, please see https://dev-developer.hcssapps.com/getting-started/troubleshoot-bad-request

get.summary: Gets a list of recorded meetings
get.description:
Gets a list of recorded meetings.

For help with authorization, please visit https://developer.hcssapps.com/getting-started/request-tokens

parameters.name: employeeId
parameters.description: Filters for meetings in which this employee is listed as an attendee

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filters for meetings occurring on or after this date

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filters for meetings occurring on or before this date

400.description:
Bad Request. This typically means one or more request validation errors occurred.
Check the response body for details.
For more help troubleshooting, please see https://dev-developer.hcssapps.com/getting-started/troubleshoot-bad-request

EmployeeInjuries.description: Detailed list of all employee injuries in this incident

CreatedDateUtc.description: The UTC date and time the incident record was created. This value cannot be changed, any edits to this field will be ignored.

LastModifiedUtc.description: The UTC date and time of the last modification to the incident. This value is generated automatically, any edits to this field will be ignored.

BusinessUnitDescription.description: The description for the business unit associated with this incident. This value cannot be changed, edits to this value will trigger a 400 Bad Request response.

ReportingStatus.description: Insurance claim reporting status for this incident

InsuranceCompanyName.description: Insurance claim company name for this incident

ClaimNumber.description: Insurance claim number for this incident

ID.description: The HCSS unique identifier for the incident.

CaseNumber.description: The user-entered unique identifier for the incident. Must be unique within each company.

JobCode.description: The code for the job where the incident occurred

BusinessUnitCode.description: The code for the business unit associated with this incident. This value cannot be changed, edits to this value will trigger a 400 Bad Request response.

LocationDescription.description: A description of the location where the incident occurred

ReportedDateUtc.description: The UTC date and time when the incident was reported

RecorderCode.description: The employee code of the person who recorded the incident

PersonInChargeCode.description: The employee code of the employee in charge when the incident occurred

IncidentDateUtc.description: The UTC date and time when the incident occurred

Status.description:
Incident Status for this incident. 
Options: 'Open', 'Received', or 'Completed'.

Weather.description: Weather conditions at the time of the incident

PersonMostFamiliarCode.description: The employee code for the person most familiar with the incident

RecordedEmail.description: Email of the person who recorded the incident

RecordedPhoneNumber.description: Phone Number of the person who recorded the incident

PersonInChargeEmail.description: Email of the person in charge when the incident occurred

PersonInChargePhoneNumber.description: Phone Number of the person in charge when the incident occurred

PersonMostFamiliarEmail.description: Email of the person most familiar with the incident

PersonMostFamiliarPhoneNumber.description: Phone Number of the person most familiar with the incident

IsMSHAInvestigation.description: Did the incident required a MSHA Investigation

Individuals.description: Individuals list for MSHA Investigation. Separated by semi-colon (;)

ApiEmployeeInjury.description:
Employee injury form.
This is based on the Employee Injury Form Revision 10 (06-09-2019)

EmployeeCode.description: The employee code for the injured employee

JobTitle.description: Job Title for the injured employee

DateOfHire.description: Date of hire for the injured employee

YearsWithCompanyString.description: Years with the company for the injured employee

YearsInConstructionString.description: Years in construction for the injured employee

TimeStartedWork.description: Time the employee started to work

ActivityAtTime.description: Activity at the time of the injury

IncidentCauseCategoryString.description: incident cause of the injury category

IncidentCauseTypeString.description: incident cause of the injury type

InjuredBodyPartCategoryString.description: Injured body of the employee category

InjuredBodyPartTypeString.description: Injured body of the employee type

DrugAlcoholTest.description: Did the treatment had a drug/alcohol test

DrugAlcoholTestFacility.description: Facility the drug/alcohol test was made

FirstAidMedOnly.description: Did it required First Aid/Med Only

TreatedAwayFromWorkSite.description: Did it required to be treated away from work site

TreatedAwayFromWorkSiteProvidedBy.description: Who treated the injury away from work site

TreatedInAnEmergencyRoom.description: If it was treated in an emergency room

IsRecordable.description: Is the injury recordable for OSHA

DaysAwayFromWork.description: Days the employee was away from work

DaysOnJobTransfer.description: Days the employee was on job transfer

RootCause.description: Root Cause properties for the form

ExperienceJobTitle.description: Number of years/months with this job title

ExperienceJobTitleMeasure.description: Measurement in years or months for the job title

ExperienceMine.description: Number of years/months with this mine

ExperienceMineMeasure.description: Measurement in years or months for this mine

ExperienceTotalMining.description: Number of years/months in Total Mining Expirience

ExperienceTotalMiningMeasure.description: Measurement in years or months in Total Mining Expirience

ApiRootCause.description:
A POCO representing root cause sections of form
This is based on the all Forms Revision 10 (06-09-2019)

EmployeeReceivedSafetyTrainingString.description: Employee received safety training for the activity before the accident?

EmployeeNeedsSafetyTrainingString.description: Employee needs safety training/retraining for the activity?

OtherEmployeeNeedSafetyTrainingString.description: Other employees need safety training/retraining for the activity?

AssigneeCode.description: Employee Code for Preventive Accountability Assignee

Questions.description: Questions and answers on the incident form

ApiIncidentFormQuestion.description: Information on the form question and answer

Attachments.description: If answer has attachments, list of attachments

Passengers.description: If answer has passengers, list of passengers

Address.description: If answer is an address, the address

OtherVehicles.description: If answer has other vehicles, list of other vehicles

OtherPassengers.description: If answer has other passengers, list of other passengers

Items.description: If answer has items, list of items

DaysInterval.description: If answer is interval of days, contains information on days away

Make.description: The make of the other vehicle

Model.description: The model of the other vehicle

Year.description: The year of the other vehicle

LicensePlate.description: The license plate of the other vehicle

VinNumber.description: The VIN number of the other vehicle

State.description: The state/territory of the other vehicle

Carrier.description: The insurance carrier for the other vehicle

PolicyNumber.description: The insurance policy number for the other vehicle

Name.description: Name of the other vehicle passenger

MobilePhone.description: Mobile phone of the other vehicle passenger

HomePhone.description: Home phone of the other vehicle passenger

Address1.description: Address line 1 of the other vehicle passenger

Address2.description: Address line 2 of the other vehicle passenger

City.description: City of the other vehicle passenger

State.description: State of the other vehicle passenger

Zip.description: Zip of the other vehicle passenger

Country.description: Country of the other vehicle passenger

EstimatedValue.description: Estimated value of the reported item

IncludeWeekends.description: If weekends are included in calculating total days away

Meetings.description: List of meetings matching the requested parameters

MeetingDate.description: The date this meeting was held

Employees.description: List of employees attending this meeting

Visitors.description: List of non-employee visitors attending this meeting
